bio:
Herran is a Nord merchant who owns a shipping business. Despite his penchant for melodramatics, it is clear he is not actually sentimental when it comes to recent the loss of his cargo ship, the Autumn Gale.
Quotes:
"Yes, I did lose a fair share of capital when the ship went down. Luckily, I've got the boat insured by a very wealthy thane."
name: Herran
